item.title: Anonymous: Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
1) This comment is unrelated to the post, because after spending over an HOUR looking I cannot find or obtain access (no clue what the admin password is to even access the post function) to the proper TRAC forum to post a bug report. Someone should make accessing the bug reports a little easier.

2) The bug report I want to make is in regard to apparent exit-node filtering blocking english.aljazeera.com so I can't read the news there through tor. The site is accessible directly, but not through tor.

item.title: phobos: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: If you don't want to register, the generic username/password is right on the front page, second paragraph in italics.

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: My server is in the Tor status list, but TorWeather keeps telling me the fingerprint does not exist, hence I can not register.

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 4
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: This doesn't work for me. If I want to signup for the weather, I get the message that you cannot find my node 19D0D20C8FD98D994488177D5F7CE36D7B7253F9, although I can find it with under https://metrics.torproject.org/relay-search.html?search=19D0D20C8FD98D99.... Any ideas?

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 5

item.description: a robot could solve that problem lol
